definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
see 嘴上沒毛，辦事不牢|嘴上没毛，办事不牢[zui3 shang4 mei2 mao2 , ban4 shi4 bu4 lao2]
pinyin: zui3 shang4 wu2 mao2 , ban4 shi4 bu4 lao2

sentences.english: He has white and black fur, without hair.
The stems have coiling tendrils and are green, slender, and hairless.
sentences.chinese: 茎有卷须和卷取是绿色的，纤细，无毛。

sentences.english: Their hairless faces have protruding lower jaws filled with pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 他们脸上无毛，突出的下巴上利齿密布。

sentences.english: The eye of a blue macaw is surrounded by a featherless golden rim.
sentences.chinese: 蓝金刚鹦鹉的眼睛具有金色无毛的眼眶。

sentences.english: Corollaceous weak pink, inside have purple spot, staminal filament does not have wool.
sentences.chinese: 花冠淡粉红色，内间有紫色斑点，雄蕊花丝无毛。

sentences.english: They have wrinkled, gray-brown skin that is almost hairless.
sentences.chinese: 他们有皱纹，灰棕皮肤，几乎是无毛。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong, erect, glabrous or pubescent, base of lateral pair not saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片长圆形，直立，无毛或被短柔毛，基部侧对不。
瘦果身体无毛或近无毛。
瘦果身体无毛或近无毛。

sentences.english: Herbs ca. 1 cm tall, sparsely short hispid or subglabrous .
sentences.chinese: 草本约1厘米高，疏生或近无毛。

sentences.english: Herbs, annual, decumbent or creeping, adventitiously rooting at nodes, glabrous.
sentences.chinese: 一年生草本，外倾或匍匐的，在节上不定根，无毛。

definition: axillary (botany)/budding in the angle between branch and stem
